description.value:
You can use unstable clockwork devices in your invention to push your invention to act more quickly. You are quickened for this turn. How you can use the extra action depends on your invention.

  • Magitek Armor You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or use another movement action granted by your invention (such as Swim if you have the Diving Armor feat).
  • Magitek Mech You can use the extra action to have your mech make an unarmed Strike, Step, Stride, or use another movement action granted by your invention. This ignores the normal maximum of 3 mech actions across all pilots, though only 1 pilot can perform an additional action this way.
  • Magitek Pawn You can use the extra action to Command your construct invention (or to provide 1 of the actions if you spend 2 actions to Command your construct).
  • Skysteel Multi-Tool You can use the extra action to Strike with your invention or Reload your invention.

value.value: Magitek Armor, Magitek Mech, Magitek Pawn, or Skysteel Multi-Tool invention
